workflow-alignment-stats-report.title: Workflow alignment statistics report
workflow-alignment-stats-report.description: Report of the alignment statistics for each tumor/normal paired sample.

workflow-snv-report.title: Workflow SNV report
workflow-snv-report.description: Report of the SNV for each tumor/normal paired sample.

workflow-sv-report.title: Workflow SV report
workflow-sv-report.description: Report of the SV for each tumor/normal paired sample.

workflow-mod-report.title: Workflow MOD report
workflow-mod-report.description: Report of the modified bases for each tumor/normal paired sample.

snv-vcf.title: Somatic short variant VCF
snv-vcf.description: VCF file with the somatic SNVs for the sample.

snv-vcf-index.title: Somatic short variant VCF index
snv-vcf-index.description: The index of the resulting VCF file with the somatic SNVs for the sample.

sv-vcf.title: Somatic structural variant VCF
sv-vcf.description: VCF file with the somatic SVs for the sample.

sv-vcf-index.title: Somatic structural variant VCF index
sv-vcf-index.description: The index of the resulting VCF file with the somatic SVs for the sample.

mod-bedmethyl-normal.title: Modified bases BEDMethyl (normal)
mod-bedmethyl-normal.description: BED file with the aggregated modification counts for the normal sample.

mod-bedmethyl-tumor.title: Modified bases BEDMethyl (tumor)
mod-bedmethyl-tumor.description: BED file with the aggregated modification counts for the tumor sample.

haplotagged-alignment-normal.title: Haplotagged alignment file (normal)
haplotagged-alignment-normal.description: BAM or CRAM file with the haplotagged reads for the normal sample.

haplotagged-alignment-index-normal.title: Haplotagged alignment file index (normal)
haplotagged-alignment-index-normal.description: The index of the resulting BAM or CRAM file with the haplotagged reads for the normal sample.

haplotagged-alignment-tumor.title: Haplotagged alignment file (tumor)
haplotagged-alignment-tumor.description: BAM or CRAM file with the haplotagged reads for the tumor sample.

haplotagged-alignment-index-tumor.title: Haplotagged alignment file index (tumor)
haplotagged-alignment-index-tumor.description: The index of the resulting BAM or CRAM file with the haplotagged reads for the tumor sample.
